BenefitType.name: BenefitType
BenefitType.description: Represents information about the type of benefits that can be applied to an individual or a group.

Category.description: Required. The category of the benefit type. Picklist values aren't provided for this field and must be added based on the requirements of the organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the benefit type.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ProcessType.description: Required. The process type associated with the benefit type. Set to PublicSector.

Type.description: Specifies the type of benefit being offered.

UnitofMeasureId.description: The identifier of the unit of measure that's used to calculate the benefit type.
